intro: This list includes the shortest ever verified people in their lifetime or profession. The entries below are broken down into different categories which range from sex, to age group and occupations. Most of the sourcing is done by Guinness World Records which in the last decade has added new categories for mobile and non mobile men and women. The world's shortest verified man is Chandra Bahadur Dangi, while for women Pauline Musters holds the record.
